City Brewing Company

Beverage Manufacturing

La Crosse, WI 4,699 followers

Premier beverage production & packaging facility headquartered in La Crosse WI with three additional sites across the US

About us

City Brewing Company is a premier, state-of-the-art beverage production and packaging company. Our four locations in La Crosse, WI, Latrobe, PA, Memphis TN and Irwindale, CA provide facilities capable of manufacturing and packaging beers, teas, soft drinks, energy drinks and other new age beverages. Our packaging capacity makes us one of the largest beverage producers in the country.

Website
http://www.citybrewery.com
